title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-2.3 - Use of reserve
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-2.3 - Use of reserve

State Regulations

The reserve accumulated shall be available to meet
vacancy and collection losses in any calendar quarter in which the actual
losses exceed an amount equal to three per cent of the total dwelling rent
schedule for such quarter. In any such quarter the reserve shall be drawn upon
to meet such excesses to the extent of the balance available in the
reserve. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1647-2.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
